SELECT ACCESSION_RECORD_UUID as accessionRecordUuid, ACCESSION_NO as accessionNo, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ACQUISITION_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') as acquisitionDate, ACQUISITION_SOURCE as acquisitionSource, ACQUISITION_TYPE_UUID as acquisitionTypeUuid, INPUT_CODE_UUID as inputCodeUuid, TITLE as title, as insertUuid, INSERT_DATE as insertDate, as updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM IG_ACCESSION_RECORD
ACCESSION_NO LIKE '%' || #{accessionNo} || '%'
AND A1.DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_DATE between to_date(#{acquisitionFromDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{acquisitionToDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND ACQUISITION_SOURCE LIKE '%' || #{acquisitionSource} || '%'
ORDER BY ACQUISITION_DATE DESC
